title: Fisheries Surveyor
description: We are looking for fresh graduates to conduct surveys on fishermen's catches in Badung Regency. Must be able to ride a motorcycle and have a smartphone for data recording.

title: Mapping Surveyor
description: We are looking for fresh graduates to survey subak mapping data in Tabanan Regency. Must be able to ride a motorcycle and have a smartphone for field surveys.

title: Administrative Staff
description: Looking for administrative staff with at least 1 year of experience in company financial management. No certificate required.

title: Technical Leader
description: Looking for a project team leader. Must have at least 2 years of experience and be able to manage a team effectively. No certificate required.

title: GIS Specialist
description: Proficient in using QGIS or ArcGIS. Able to analyze spatial data. Minimum 1 year of experience.
